statements: SELECT * FROM player_data;
SELECT player_name, position, ranking FROM player_data ORDER BY ranking DESC;
SELECT player_name, ranking FROM player_data WHERE position = 'QB';
SELECT player_name, scouting_report FROM player_data WHERE ranking > 20;
SELECT player_name, draft_projection FROM player_data ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, position FROM player_data WHERE ranking > 10;
SELECT * FROM player_data WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT player_name, ranking, draft_projection FROM player_data WHERE position = 'QB';
SELECT player_name, scouting_report FROM player_data WHERE ranking BETWEEN 5 AND 15;
SELECT player_name, position, scouting_report FROM player_data WHERE draft_projection LIKE '%first round%';
SELECT * FROM scouting_reports;
SELECT player_id, report_text FROM scouting_reports WHERE report_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM player_rankings ORDER BY rank DESC;
SELECT player_id, rank FROM player_rankings WHERE scouting_grade > 4.5;
SELECT player_id, rank, scouting_grade FROM player_rankings WHERE rank <= 10;
SELECT * FROM scouting_reports WHERE report_id = '0001';
SELECT player_id, report_text FROM scouting_reports WHERE player_id = '1234' ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(rank) AS top_rank FROM player_rankings;
SELECT player_id, scouting_grade FROM player_rankings WHERE rank <= 10 AND scouting_grade >= 80 ORDER BY scouting_grade DESC;
SELECT player_id, rank, scouting_grade FROM player_rankings WHERE rank = 1 AND scouting_grade = 90;
SELECT * FROM scouting_reports;
SELECT player_id, report_text FROM scouting_reports ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, report_text FROM scouting_reports WHERE player_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM player_rankings WHERE rank < 50;
SELECT player_id, position FROM player_rankings WHERE position = 'QB';
SELECT * FROM scouting_reports WHERE player_id = 1 ORDER BY report_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, report_text FROM scouting_reports WHERE report_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM scouting_reports GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(report_id) > 2;
SELECT p.player_id, p.position, d.projected_pick, d.team FROM player_rankings AS p INNER JOIN draft_projections AS d ON p.player_id = d.player_id ORDER BY d.projected_pick ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT d.*, r.rank FROM draft_projections AS d LEFT JOIN player_rankings AS r ON d.player_id = r.player_id WHERE d.projected_pick < 10 AND r.position = 'QB';
SELECT * FROM scouting_reports;
SELECT player_name, report_text, report_date FROM scouting_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT player_name, ranking_value FROM player_rankings WHERE ranking_value > 80 ORDER BY ranking_value DESC;
SELECT player_name, projected_position FROM draft_projections WHERE projected_position = 'QB' ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, acquisition_date, acquisition_method FROM talent_acquisition WHERE acquisition_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM scouting_reports ORDER BY player_name ASC, report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, count(report_id) AS num_reports FROM scouting_reports GROUP BY player_name HAVING num_reports > 3;
SELECT player_name, projection_date FROM draft_projections WHERE projected_position = 'PG' AND projection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, ranking_value FROM player_rankings WHERE ranking_value > 80 ORDER BY ranking_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT player_name FROM talent_acquisition WHERE acquisition_method = 'Draft' ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM scouting_reports;
SELECT player_id, report_text FROM scouting_reports ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT scout_id, player_id, report_text FROM scouting_reports WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT player_id, overall_rank, position_rank FROM player_rankings WHERE overall_rank > 10 ORDER BY overall_rank DESC;
SELECT * FROM draft_projections WHERE projected_round = 1 AND projected_pick < 10;
SELECT * FROM scouting_reports ORDER BY player_id DESC, scout_id ASC;
SELECT player_id, report_text FROM scouting_reports WHERE scout_id = 123 AND player_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT player_id, overall_rank, position_rank FROM player_rankings WHERE overall_rank > 50 ORDER BY position_rank ASC;
SELECT player_id, projected_round FROM draft_projections WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT scout_id, analysis_text FROM talent_analysis WHERE talent_score >= 80 AND LENGTH(analysis_text) > 100 ORDER BY scout_id ASC;
